indeterminate.description: Sets the circular-progress into its indeterminate state.

progress.description: Sets the progress bar's value. Value should be between [0, 1].

density.description: Sets the progress indicator's sizing based on density scale. Minimum value is -8. Each unit change in density scale corresponds to 4px change in side dimensions. The stroke width adjusts automatically.

closed.description: Sets the progress indicator to the closed state. Sets content opacity to 0. Typically should be set to true when loading has finished.
